title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.3 - Impeding purposes of Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.3 - Impeding purposes of Act

State Regulations

In the event that any regulation adopted by the commission
has been or is being utilized by any person to impede, obstruct or frustrate
the purposes of the Act, the commission may by resolution revoke or suspend, in
whole or in part, the privileges accorded to such person by such regulation
when in its opinion the purposes of the Act will thereby be furthered or
effectuated. Nothing contained in these regulations shall, however, abridge any
statutory or constitutional right of such person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง
1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
